messages: 37fbfa010fd71aee893714d10bb31643 (20:19): vapier, do you have some key combo to turn your wifi on/off? I think that's what it is refering to
72c719c6dd0b06c78e7828006c47f98c (20:19): no idea, this is just some loaner dell laptop
72c719c6dd0b06c78e7828006c47f98c (20:19): it's got SuSE on it
72c719c6dd0b06c78e7828006c47f98c (20:20): gonna look in the bios, brb
4da9392b3543880836e0d40adda92b13 (20:23): vapier: check that the firmware_class module is loaded
72c719c6dd0b06c78e7828006c47f98c (20:27): stupid bios had wireless disabled
72c719c6dd0b06c78e7828006c47f98c (20:27): eth1      Link encap:Ethernet  HWaddr 00:0E:35:73:79:AC
72c719c6dd0b06c78e7828006c47f98c (20:28): both are using 802.11b now according to iwconfig
72c719c6dd0b06c78e7828006c47f98c (20:29): jforman: i know you want me to, but i'm busy atm
380738552b09c31738390320d5e1f569 (20:29): vapier: your state has the most fscked up DMV laws, what a pita
72c719c6dd0b06c78e7828006c47f98c (20:32): KingTaco: it wont take modulation
37fbfa010fd71aee893714d10bb31643 (20:32): vapier, the ipw2200 or the other card?
37fbfa010fd71aee893714d10bb31643 (20:33): iirc, the ipw card you can restrict the bands via module param
72c719c6dd0b06c78e7828006c47f98c (20:33): # iwconfig eth1 modulation 11b
72c719c6dd0b06c78e7828006c47f98c (20:33): Error : unrecognised wireless request "modulation"
37fbfa010fd71aee893714d10bb31643 (20:33): you must have a older version of iwconfig then
37fbfa010fd71aee893714d10bb31643 (20:34): mike@koala ~ $ iwconfig --version
37fbfa010fd71aee893714d10bb31643 (20:34): iwconfig  Wireless-Tools version 29
72c719c6dd0b06c78e7828006c47f98c (20:34): iwconfig  Wireless-Tools version 28
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (20:35): Mr_Bones_: what tests are you exempting from repoman these days?
37fbfa010fd71aee893714d10bb31643 (20:36): vapier, gimme a minute to downgrade to your version
312c60a696ee6c11196fb7da47743b17 (20:36): any locate experts around?
72c719c6dd0b06c78e7828006c47f98c (20:36): slocate steev-laptop ?
13452900174cd54931a2f7bc36474c44 (20:36): no xmllint, no empty HOMEPAGE check, no stat for cvs header date check, no "silly KEYWORDs" check... maybe a couple more.
72c719c6dd0b06c78e7828006c47f98c (20:36): empty HOMEPAGE check is dumb
312c60a696ee6c11196fb7da47743b17 (20:37): wondering if there is a way to disable .svn directories
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (20:37): Mr_Bones_: clarify on silly keywords check
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (20:37): KEYWORDS.stupid ?
13452900174cd54931a2f7bc36474c44 (20:37): oh, .stupid, not .silly.  yeah, that one.
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (20:37): why did you exempt it?
37fbfa010fd71aee893714d10bb31643 (20:38): vapier, looks like 28 doesn't have an option to limit the band.  for the ipw2200, you should be able to set it via module parameter
13452900174cd54931a2f7bc36474c44 (20:38): I don't care about that one enough to do anything about it.
72c719c6dd0b06c78e7828006c47f98c (20:38): steev-laptop: hmm, dunno :x
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (20:38): Mr_Bones_: any additional checks you would suggest?

312c60a696ee6c11196fb7da47743b17 (20:39): vapier: its ok, i have a lot of repos, and wanna ignore that meta text crap, maybe ill look into some hack i read about that puts all .svn metadata on its own partition
72c719c6dd0b06c78e7828006c47f98c (20:39): steev-laptop: you could try editing updatedb.conf
13452900174cd54931a2f7bc36474c44 (20:39): the main thing I'd like to see for repoman is the reverse deps checking needed for when removing ebuilds.  but that's not that easy to do I suppose.
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (20:39): what's tricky about is the views...
312c60a696ee6c11196fb7da47743b17 (20:40): vapier: i thought i have to specify each directory i want to ignore?
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (20:40): need to screw with the queries a bit to see exactly how, but should be doable with pkgcore
72c719c6dd0b06c78e7828006c47f98c (20:41): steev-laptop: dunno

13452900174cd54931a2f7bc36474c44 (20:41): I'm also pretty picky about the whitespace for ebuilds so if it were up to me, repoman would warn about things like blank lines at the end of the ebuild, and missing spaces for things like "src_unpack{", etc.
72c719c6dd0b06c78e7828006c47f98c (20:41): steev-laptop: if that fails, i think it may support regexp ...
312c60a696ee6c11196fb7da47743b17 (20:41): ill look into it
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (20:42): Mr_Bones_: beyond that?  metadata scans is specifically what I'm wondering about atm.
13452900174cd54931a2f7bc36474c44 (20:43): oh, warning for not quoting user-specified variables would be evil.
13452900174cd54931a2f7bc36474c44 (20:44): I keep meaning to set DISTDIR to something like "/usr/local/my portage distfiles" or something, just to see things explode.
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (20:45): adjusting PORTAGE_TMPDIR is a better notion.
74c761012c0f07003f60498f0c4eaf8c (20:45): the distdir symlink tricks added block DISTDIR from causing explosions offhand
13452900174cd54931a2f7bc36474c44 (20:46): yeah that'd work too.  I guess I was hoping for *some* stuff working. ;-)
72c719c6dd0b06c78e7828006c47f98c (20:46): KingTaco: yeah, looks like 29 is first one to support modulation
37fbfa010fd71aee893714d10bb31643 (20:46): vapier, what band are you trying to use?
72c719c6dd0b06c78e7828006c47f98c (20:47): The main features of the latest beta is WE-21 support (long/short retry, power saving level, modulation)
72c719c6dd0b06c78e7828006c47f98c (20:47): KingTaco: one machine only supports 802.11b
72c719c6dd0b06c78e7828006c47f98c (20:47): stupid suse only has ver28
72c719c6dd0b06c78e7828006c47f98c (20:47): so i'll have to build by hand
37fbfa010fd71aee893714d10bb31643 (20:47): vapier, then you can probably exclude the modulation command.  it should default to b
37fbfa010fd71aee893714d10bb31643 (20:48): plus b/g use the same channel, so the ipw card /should/ be smart enough to drop to b when it figures out that g is unusable
72c719c6dd0b06c78e7828006c47f98c (20:49): still aint pinging though :/
37fbfa010fd71aee893714d10bb31643 (20:49): did you resolve that wierd dmesg warning about woreless not working?
72c719c6dd0b06c78e7828006c47f98c (20:50): i rebooted and turned on the card in bios
37fbfa010fd71aee893714d10bb31643 (20:50): both card have mac addresses now?
13452900174cd54931a2f7bc36474c44 (20:50): ferringb: oh... how about warning if an ebuild defines a function but never calls it.
37fbfa010fd71aee893714d10bb31643 (20:51): vapier, essid's are now the same?
